alert.note: Alert for Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 8:22AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Harrison, northwestern Rusk, south central Upshur and Gregg Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 822 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gladewater to Kilgore to New London to near Turnertown. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Longview, Henderson, Kilgore, White Oak, Gladewater, Hallsville, Overton, New London, Clarksville City, East Mountain, Liberty City, Joinerville, Turnertown, Lakeport, Easton, Union Grove, Warren City, Rolling Meadows, Monroe and Stewart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for northeastern Texas.
